On [[6 January]] [[1969]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Paula Coston'''.<ref>{{webcite|author=Trotter|articleurl=http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?forum=12&post_id=13835#forumpost13835 |website=Guide|accessed=4 July 2014}}</ref>

*'''Description:''' 1 page, handwritten.
*'''Publication:''' A picture of the letter was published in [[Writing Magazine (August 2014)|''Writing Magazine'', August 2014]].
